ðŸš€ My Featured Projects

Each project blends performance, scalability, and design precision.

View Project â†’

{{ project.name }}

{{ project.expanded ? project.description : (project.description | slice:0:150) + '...' }}

{{ tech }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-projects', templateUrl: './projects.component.html', styleUrls: ['./projects.component.css'] }) export class ProjectsComponent { featuredProject = { name: "Dynamic HRMS Management System", description: `A full-scale Human Resource Management System (HRMS) designed for enterprise automation â€” managing attendance, payroll, leave, recruitment, performance, and employee lifecycle under one unified platform. The system enables real-time data synchronization between HR, Payroll, and Management dashboards, ensuring transparency and efficiency across all departments. Key features include automated attendance tracking, policy-based payroll computation, dynamic leave configuration, department-level analytics, and custom workflow approvals â€” all integrated into a responsive interface built with Angular and PHP (CodeIgniter).`, techStack: ["Angular", "PHP", "MySQL", "CodeIgniter"], link: "https://your-hrms-demo-link.com" }; projects = [ { name: "UbiCRM â€” Customer Relationship Management", description: `UbiCRM is a multi-tenant CRM platform designed to help sales teams efficiently manage leads, deals, and customer relationships through automation, analytics, and real-time insights. As the Lead Full Stack Developer, I designed and optimized both the frontend and backend systems using Angular and AdonisJS. I developed a modular CRM architecture covering Leads, Deals, Activities, and Reports, while implementing RESTful APIs and optimizing SQL queries to improve backend performance by 45%. The platform includes a multi-organization structure ensuring complete data isolation and security. I integrated Highcharts.js for dynamic sales analytics and interactive dashboards, and enhanced system security through token-based authentication and encrypted identifiers. The result was a scalable, high-performance CRM with an improved user experience and strong data reliability.`, techStack: ["Angular 17", "AdonisJS", "MySQL", "Highcharts.js"], link: "https://your-crm-demo-link.com" }, { name: "Organization Management System", description: `A centralized organization management platform designed to streamline onboarding, subscription tracking, and workflow automation across multiple departments. Built using AngularJS and PHP (CodeIgniter), this system efficiently handled 3000+ organizations with features like multi-level approval processes, renewal scheduling, and real-time subscription validation. Automated notifications and approval workflows significantly reduced administrative workload and improved process turnaround time by 30%.`, techStack: ["AngularJS", "PHP (CodeIgniter)", "MySQL"], link: "https://your-org-demo-link.com" }, { name: "Payroll Penalty Automation System", description: `A dynamic payroll rule engine built to automate penalty deductions based on attendance logs and late marks. The system empowers HR administrators to define and manage deduction policies directly from the dashboard â€” eliminating the need for developer involvement. Through real-time attendance integration and rule-based logic, it reduced manual payroll adjustments by 70% and ensured accuracy across monthly payroll runs.`, techStack: ["Angular", "PHP", "MySQL"], link: "https://your-payroll-demo-link.com" }, { name: "Automatic Email & Notification System", description: "Developed a robust email/notification module enabling automated communication across departments, including reminders, alerts, and HR workflows.", techStack: ["Angular", "PHP", "MySQL"], link: "#" } ]; }
